mapper.sql: fq_installment_applications_id, card_nbr, custr_nbr, account, cardholder, micro_no, prod_id, mp_amt, mp_instl, nbr_mths, mpau_sts, status_day, deccan_rea, auth_day, auth_emp, auth_time, match_day, preauth_dy, preauth_tm, inp_empno, curr_num, dedu_fee, app_sday_new, chanelno, fee_pcnt, feepcnt_pn, bal_mp_amt, bal_mp_amt_flg, txt_date
mapper.insert:
insert into fq_installment_applications (fq_installment_applications_id, card_nbr, custr_nbr, account, cardholder, micro_no, prod_id, mp_amt, mp_instl, nbr_mths, mpau_sts, status_day, deccan_rea, auth_day, auth_emp, auth_time, match_day, preauth_dy, preauth_tm, inp_empno, curr_num, dedu_fee, app_sday_new, chanelno, fee_pcnt, feepcnt_pn, bal_mp_amt, bal_mp_amt_flg, txt_date ) values
(#{item.fqInstallmentApplicationsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.cardNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.custrNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cardholder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.microNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.prodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.mpInstl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.nbrMths,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mpauSts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.statusDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deccanRea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.authDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.authEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.authTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.matchDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.preauthDy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.preauthTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inpEmpno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.currNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.deduFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.appSdayNew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.chanelno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.feePcnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.feepcntPn,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.balMpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.balMpAmtFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.txtDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
